tours.name: 4 Days Da Nang - Bana Hill - Coconut Village - Hoi An
tours.description: Discover the best of Central Vietnam with this 4-day tour. Visit the stunning Golden Bridge at Bana Hills, explore the ancient town of Hoi An, experience traditional fishing at Coconut Village, and enjoy the vibrant culture of Da Nang.

itinerary.title: Danang Arrival
itinerary.content:
Arrive at Da Nang International Airport
Hotel check-in
Free time for leisure and dinner
üìç Overnight in Da Nang

itinerary.title: Bana Hill Tour
itinerary.content:
07:00-8:15: Our tour guide will pick you up at your hotel in Da Nang Central. 8:30: We will stop at a traditional craft village to make a list and prepare tickets for our visit. This is on the same route to Ba Na Hill.
09h45-10h00: We will arrive at the entrance of Ba Na Hills and board the world's longest 1-rope cable car to the romantic French Village.
10h30: We will visit the Lunar Castle, Eclipse Square, and watch movies at Mat Bay Theatre, the most modern Moon Junction Theatre in the world.
11:45-13:00: We will have a buffet lunch at a restaurant.
13h15: We will enjoy mini shows and take photos with the sparkling golden Sun World Globe, as well as explore the fun Fantasy Park.

14:45: We will take a short cable car ride from the French Village to The Golden Bridge, where we can admire hundreds of blooming flowers at Le Jardin flower garden
16:15-16:30: Return to the cable car and head to the Time Gate.
Our bus will be ready to take us back to the hotel or meeting point.
(There will be no shopping at the end of the day)

itinerary.title: Coconut Village ‚Äì Hoi An
itinerary.content:
13:00: Tour guide will pick you up at your hotel.
Start your adventure with Cam Thanh Coconut for being a fisherman at Cam Thanh Coconut Village, you will experience learning traditional fishing techniques and how to row unique Vietnamese bamboo basket boats while exploring the tranquil coconut palm waterways of the past war. On this tour, we provide authentic social and cultural insights into the local way of life in Vietnam. Furthermore, you will take part in some hands-on activities which are fun, safe, and interesting and are suitable for everybody.
14:30: Visit to the next destination to Hoi An Old Town:
Go to Phuc Kien Chinese Assembly Hall, a colorful melange of bright gates, dragon statues, and elaborate rooftops. Get an introduction to ancestor worship while visiting the family altar and watching local devotees making offerings.
You will see remarkably well-preserved old houses, Phung Hung Ancient House or Tan Ky Ancient House that have withstood 200 years of weather and war. Learn about the prosperous merchants who used to live in these homes, trading with buyers from all around the world. Visit Museum of Folk Culture in Hoi An A display of artifacts depicts ancient local daily life. You will especially enjoy art shows at Hoi An Traditional Performing Arts House.
Make a stop at the Japanese Bridge. The bridge spans a small waterway and was constructed more than 400 years ago to connect the Japanese community with the Chinese who lived on the other side of the water. Admire the carvings and paintings inside the bridge, learning about their symbolism and cultural significance.
Additionally, visit some of Hoi An's well-known handicraft shops and artwork galleries. Discover smaller laneways and local neighborhoods, gaining a better appreciation of Hoi An's endless charm.
Dinner with Hoi An specialty food.
18h00: Enjoy your time with the boat ride on Hoai River and release the flower lanterns to pray for the best of luck to you and your family. You will immerse yourself in the fanciful space of the lantern street. Free your time with the night market and enjoy the shimmering space of Hoi An.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.content:
Hotel Breakfast
Check out from the hotel and board your transfer to the airport

seo.title: 4 Days Da Nang - Bana Hill - Hoi An Tour | TaHa Travel
seo.description: Explore Central Vietnam in 4 days. Visit Golden Bridge at Bana Hills, experience traditional fishing at Coconut Village, and discover the ancient charm of Hoi An.
seo.keywords: danang tour, bana hills, golden bridge, hoi an ancient town, coconut village, central vietnam, vietnam travel, cam thanh

tours.name: 5 Days Da Nang - Bana Hill - Hoi An - Hue Imperial City
tours.description: Experience the cultural highlights of Central Vietnam in 5 days. Explore Golden Bridge at Bana Hills, wander through ancient Hoi An, discover Hue's Imperial Citadel and royal tombs, and enjoy the scenic beauty of Hai Van Pass.

itinerary.title: Danang Arrival
itinerary.content:
Arrive at Da Nang International Airport
Hotel check-in
Free time for leisure and dinner
üìç Overnight in Da Nang

itinerary.title: Bana Hill Tour
itinerary.content:
07h00-8h15: Our tour guide will pick you up at your hotel in Da Nang Central. 8:30am: We will stop at a traditional craft village to make a list and prepare tickets for our visit. This is on the same route to Ba Na Hill.
09:45-10:00: We will arrive at the entrance of Ba Na Hills and board the world's longest 1-rope cable car to the romantic French Village.
10:30: We will visit the Lunar Castle, Eclipse Square, and watch movies at Mat Bay Theatre, the most modern Moon Junction Theatre in the world.
11:45-13:00: We will have a buffet lunch at a restaurant.
13:15: We will enjoy mini shows and take photos with the sparkling golden Sun World Globe, as well as explore the fun Fantasy Park.
14:45: We will take a short cable car ride from the French Village to The Golden Bridge, where we can admire hundreds of blooming flowers at Le Jardin flower garden

16:15-16:30: Return to the cable car and head to the Time Gate.
Our bus will be ready to take us back to the hotel or meeting point.

itinerary.title: Coconut Village ‚Äì Hoi An
itinerary.content:
13:00: Tour guide will pick you up at your hotel.
Start your adventure with Cam Thanh Coconut for being a fisherman at Cam Thanh Coconut Village, you will experience learning traditional fishing techniques and how to row unique Vietnamese bamboo basket boats while exploring the tranquil coconut palm waterways of the past war. On this tour, we provide authentic social and cultural insights into the local way of life in Vietnam. Furthermore, you will take part in some hands-on activities which are fun, safe, and interesting and are suitable for everybody.
14:30: Visit to the next destination to Hoi An Old Town:
Go to Phuc Kien Chinese Assembly Hall, a colorful melange of bright gates, dragon statues, and elaborate rooftops. Get an introduction to ancestor worship while visiting the family altar and watching local devotees making offerings.
You will see remarkably well-preserved old houses, Phung Hung Ancient House or Tan Ky Ancient House that have withstood 200 years of weather and war. Learn about the prosperous merchants who used to live in these homes, trading with buyers from all around the world. Visit Museum of Folk Culture in Hoi An A display of artifacts depicts ancient local daily life. You will especially enjoy art shows at Hoi An Traditional Performing Arts House.
Make a stop at the Japanese Bridge. The bridge spans a small waterway and was constructed more than 400 years ago to connect the Japanese community with the Chinese who lived on the other side of the water. Admire the carvings and paintings inside the bridge, learning about their symbolism and cultural significance.
Additionally, visit some of Hoi An's well-known handicraft shops and artwork galleries. Discover smaller laneways and local neighborhoods, gaining a better appreciation of Hoi An's endless charm.
Dinner with Hoi An specialty food.
18:00: Enjoy your time with the boat ride on Hoai River and release the flower lanterns to pray for the best of luck to you and your family. You will immerse yourself in the fanciful space of the lantern street. Free your time with the night market and enjoy the shimmering space of Hoi An.

itinerary.title: Hue Tour
itinerary.content:
08:00- 8:30: Your tour guide will pick you up at your hotel in Da Nang. Along the way, there will be a stop at the highest point, the Hai Van Pass. Here you will see a panoramic view of Da Nang city and the beautiful long white Lang Co Beach.
11:30: Visit one of the most aesthetic royal tombs, Khai Dinh Tomb. This jaw dropping blend of Western and Eastern architecture was constructed between 1920-1931 for the 12th emperor of the Nguyen Dynasty ‚Äì Emperor Khai Dinh.
12:30: Enjoy a delicious lunch at a local restaurant serving the best Hue dishes.
13:30: Explore the Citadel - one of the UNESCO Heritage Sites in Vietnam.
Important Reminder: Please wear clothes that cover your knees when visiting this place.
15:00:  Get amazed at the beautiful Thien Mu Pagoda, the tallest pagoda in Vietnam. Due to its beauty, it became a common subject to many local folk rhymes and is considered the unofficial symbol of Hue.
16:00: Back to Da Nang via the Hai Van Tunnel. Approximate arrival in Danang is 6:30 PM. End of Hue City Tour from Danang Tour. You have free and easy time for the rest of the evening.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.content:
Hotel Breakfast
Check out from the hotel and board your transfer to the airport

seo.title: 5 Days Da Nang - Bana Hill - Hoi An - Hue Tour | TaHa Travel
seo.description: Complete Central Vietnam experience in 5 days. Visit Golden Bridge, explore Hoi An ancient town, discover Hue Imperial City and royal tombs, cross Hai Van Pass.
seo.keywords: central vietnam tour, danang bana hills, hoi an hue tour, imperial citadel, khai dinh tomb, thien mu pagoda, hai van pass, vietnam heritage

tours.name: 6 Days Da Nang - Bana Hill - Hoi An - Hue - Da Nang City Tour

itinerary.title: Danang City Tour
itinerary.content:
4:00 PM ‚Äì 4:30 PM | Hotel Pick-up Our friendly guide and driver will
meet you at your hotel in Da Nang city center. Let's begin your
exciting night journey through Da Nang!
4:30 PM ‚Äì 5:00 PM | Visit Linh Ung Pagoda
Located on Son Tra Peninsula, Linh Ung Pagoda features Vietnam's
tallest Lady Buddha statue (67m), overlooking the East Sea. A sacred
and a peaceful place surrounded by nature.
5:00 PM ‚Äì 6:00 PM | Explore Da Nang's Highlights
Dragon Bridge ‚Äì The iconic symbol of Da Nang, famous for its fire and water shows on weekends.
Love Lock Bridge ‚Äì A romantic spot with heart-shaped lanterns and a place to "lock" your love.
Han Market ‚Äì A lively traditional market offering local specialties and souvenirs.
6:00 PM ‚Äì 7:00 PM | Enjoy Local Dinner
You will enjoy a traditional Vietnamese dinner with one of the following choices:
Mi Quang ‚Äì A Central Vietnam specialty made with turmeric noodles, pork, shrimp, fresh herbs and peanuts.
Pho ‚Äì Vietnam's national dish with savory broth, soft noodles, and tender beef or chicken.
7:00 PM ‚Äì 8:00 PM | Han River Cruise ‚Äì Da Nang by Night
Board a comfortable cruise along the Han River. Admire the sparkling cityscape, illuminated bridges, and the
vibrant nightlife from a new perspective.
8:00 PM | Drop-off at Hotel ‚Äì End of Tour
We'll take you back to your hotel. Thank you for joining us, and we hope to see you again soon!

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.content:
Hotel Breakfast
Check out from the hotel and board your transfer to the airport

seo.title: 6 Days Da Nang - Bana Hill - Hoi An - Hue Complete Tour | TaHa Travel
seo.description: Ultimate Central Vietnam tour in 6 days. Golden Bridge, Hoi An ancient town, Hue Imperial City, Dragon Bridge, Han River cruise, and Da Nang city highlights.
seo.keywords: central vietnam complete tour, danang city tour, dragon bridge, han river cruise, bana hills, hoi an, hue citadel, linh ung pagoda, vietnam heritage tour
